basics.name: Nayeem Rafsan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Born and raised in Dhaka, Bangladesh I always had keen interest in technology and I started my coding journey in 2015. After highschool I pursued computer science which was a life long dream. I topped my batch and secured a perfect CGPA in my undergrad, while participating in many online/offline hackathons, coding competitions. My thesis and primary focus of research was on 3D convolutional neural network, machine learning and artifical intelligence. Just before graudation I started working for the largest fintech company in Bangladesh 'bKash Ltd' as a software engineer. Developed so many large scale financial features that millions of people are still using it today. Afterwards, I joined MoneyLion a USA based fintech company in their Kuala Lumpur HQ, currently I'm trying to expand my expertise in building sophisticated fintech products and largse scale system.
